TopicTitle: How to 'Use Docking (Translation) Mode with 0.21 ASAS'?

Articles.Content:
How can I stop ships from spinning out while I try and line up docking manoeuvres using the docking mode in 0.21?

I just don't get it. Anything I've tried so far (all my designs with all the different types of ASAS parts) keep turning when I try translating. Is the ASAS just plain turning off axis lock in translation docking mode? It feels like it is.

Is there something I'm missing that will let me dock two ships without needing to resort to controlling rotation and translation simultaneously?
